mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Largest competitor with general-purpose POS system that serves both retail and restaurants. Known for transparent pricing, modern interface, and strong presence in small business market. Square was more retail-focused but competed heavily in the restaurant space, particularly for counter-service and quick-service establishments.
